EmailTemplate.name: 201908_ChannelWebinar_JetWave_August2019_kcr.201908_ChannelPartner_Webinar_JetWa
EmailTemplate.subject: Upcoming Dealer Sales Webinar: Catch The JetWave
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Date August 27, 2019
Time 8:00 AM PST 11:00 AM EST
Hosted By: Jim Skvarla Senior Technical Sales Manager - Connectivity Products
Join our upcoming dealer webinar, Catch the JetWave: Market Outlook, Sales Updates & Quoting Strategies to Know Before NBAA, on Tuesday, August 27th at 8:00 AM PST / 11:00 AM EST. Jim Skvarla, Senior Technical Sales Manager - Connectivity Products, will cover the latest JetWave product and services information, including:
- An Overview of the Connectivity Market and the Global JetWave Outlook
- STC Updates - Tips for Solution Selling - Details on the Latest JetWave Incentives - Tools and Resources for Sales Enablement - Tips for Building a JetWave Quote
This one-hour event is one you won't want to miss! Sign up today!
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_Wi50y4_lSqSfNKDhYcRviQ]]>
This webinar is intended for Honeywell Channel Partners only, but please feel free to distribute to other members of your organization as you see fit. If this email was forwarded to you and you'd like to be notified about upcoming webinar events directly, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Channel-Partner-Webinars-Opt-In.html]]> to let us know!
